Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation

Enum Class PDFServicesMediaType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<PDFServicesMediaType>
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.PDFServicesMediaType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<PDFServicesMediaType>, java.lang.constant.Constable
public enum PDFServicesMediaType extends Enum<PDFServicesMediaType>
A mapping of Media types and extension.

Refer : Mozilla MIME type IANA media types
